extension.summary: openvpn: a full featured SSL VPN software solution that integrates OpenVPN server capabilities. (XvBMC:_old_*v6.0.1*)
extension.description: openvpn binary is installed as /storage/.kodi/addons/network.openvpn/bin/openvpn (XvBMC: promoted earlier as *v6.0.1*)
extension.disclaimer: this is an unofficial addon. please don't ask for support in openelec forum / irc channel (XvBMC: promoted earlier as *v6.0.1*)
